item.title: I tried ‘Bricking’ my phone to fix my brain
item.description: “We need to talk.” Nobody likes to hear those words from their spouse. Especially when it’s delivered in a grave tone as you rot on a couch in a grubby blankie, staring like a zombie while doomscrolli
